title: Kotlin
description: Kotlin is a modern programming language that makes developers happier, especially for Android.

snippets.Variables:
var x = 5  // Mutable
val y = 10  // Immutable
var name: String = "John"
var price: Double = 19.99
snippets.Lists:
val fruits = listOf("apple", "banana")
val mutableFruits = mutableListOf("apple", "banana")
mutableFruits.add("orange")
fruits[0]  // "apple"
fruits.size  // 2
snippets.Maps:
val ages = mapOf("John" to 30, "Alice" to 25)
val mutableAges = mutableMapOf("John" to 30)
mutableAges["Bob"] = 35
ages["John"]  // 30
